page.title: 07Sunday at the Morris's
page.content: On Sunday morning I wake up and I wake up everybody else and we watch T.V.I help Dad with the farm work like milking the cow,getting bales from the barn and feeding the calves.Sometimes I help mend the tractor or muck out our cow shed or move the cow and calves.My sister has got two horses and she likes riding them on Sunday. Mum mucks out the horses on a Sunday afternoon.I usually play in the bales in the afternoon.In the Summer my Mum gets the trap out and we have a trap ride,sometime during the day.We have a big lunch of meat,potatoes and vegetables.For tea we have sandwiches and cakes.We occasionally go to church in the morning.
